trans-unit.source: Uses Windows authentication to authenticate the user name and password in a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: Usa a autenticação do Windows para autenticar o nome de usuário e senha em um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> method uses Windows authentication to authenticate a user name and password.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>método usa a autenticação do Windows para autenticar um nome de usuário e senha.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: To provide a custom authentication scheme, see the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer um esquema de autenticação personalizada, consulte a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> classe

trans-unit.source: When the user is authenticated, claims that identify the Windows groups that a user belongs to are initially added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property and eventually to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário é autenticado, declarações que identificam os grupos do Windows que um usuário pertence a inicialmente são adicionadas a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A>propriedade e, eventualmente o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext.ClaimSets%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class by specifying whether the claims that identify the Windows groups that a user belongs to are initially added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets*> property when the user is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> classe especificando se as declarações que identificam os grupos do Windows que um usuário pertence a inicialmente são adicionadas a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets*>propriedade quando o usuário é autenticado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to get the groups the Windows user belongs to; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para obter os grupos de usuário do Windows pertence a; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified user name and password and returns the set of authorization policies for <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Autentica o nome de usuário especificado e a senha e retorna o conjunto de diretivas de autorização para <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"> </xref> tokens de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The `userName` parameter must be in one of the following formats: `domain\username` or `username`.
trans-unit.target: O `userName` parâmetro deve estar em um dos seguintes formatos: `domain\username` ou `username`.

trans-unit.source: If the `userName` parameter is in the `domain\username` format, then there must be only one backslash (\\) character separating the user name and domain.
trans-unit.target: Se o `userName` parâmetro está sendo o `domain\username` Formatar, deve haver apenas uma barra (\\) caractere separando o nome de usuário e domínio.

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário associado com o token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The password associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: A senha associada com o token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> que contém o conjunto de políticas de autorização em vigor para este aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: userName contains more than one backslash (\\) character.
